prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with blue fur and striking green eyes.
I want a playful cat-like Pokemon that uses psychic powers in battles.
Generate a sleek, blue Pokemon with notable white markings and a charming demeanor.
Make a unique Pokemon that resembles a small, agile feline with mystical abilities.
Imagine a mysterious, blue Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and enjoys exploration.
Design a Pokemon that stands out with its elegant blue coat and playful personality.
Show me a Pokemon that has a distinct psychic aura and captivating green eyes.
